attributes.action: Plant trees to tackle air pollution in London
attributes.additional_details: London air quality is deteriorating; the government is doing little about it, and such big, slow movements to electric cars are not helping the environment right now. We need a solution now, and planting tress is a cheap and pretty way to tackle it.
attributes.background: London has the worst air quality in Europe, so by planting more trees, this is a small step to help clean the air and also make Central London look prettier.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the issue you raise is not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament. This is the responsibility of the Mayor of London and the London Assembly.

The London Assembly has its own petitions process. You can find out more about how to petition the London Assembly here:

https://www.london.gov.uk/about-us/london-assembly/petitions
